content.text:
{
  "title": "Vintage Postcard - Paris Eiffel Tower",
  "description": "Beautiful vintage postcard from Paris showing the Eiffel Tower in the 1920s. The image shows a sepia-toned photograph with 'Paris - La Tour Eiffel' text at the bottom. Good condition with minor wear on edges.",
  "price": "15.00",
  "condition": "Good",
  "year": "1920s",
  "location": "Paris, France",
  "publisher": "Unknown",
  "series": "",
  "notes": "Minor edge wear, otherwise excellent. Sepia tone photograph. No writing on front."
}
